title: Sprint 10: Scaling, Architecture & Leadership
description: Strategies for high-scale applications, design patterns, and technical leadership.
items: 01- Caching Strategies: Cache tags, Cache-Aside pattern, Stampede protection
02- Distributed Locking: Atomic locks for concurrency control in distributed systems
03- Design Patterns I: Repository Pattern (When & Why), Decorator Pattern
04- Design Patterns II: Strategy Pattern, Factory Pattern implementation in Laravel
05- DTOs: Data Transfer Objects for strict data passing between layers
06- Load Testing: k6/JMeter basics, identifying bottlenecks, stress testing
07- Security Hardening: XSS, SQLi (solved by ORM), Clickjacking headers, HSTS
08- GDPR & Privacy: Right to assume, Anonymization, Data export, Encryption at rest
09- Backup & Recovery: Automating dumps, Point-In-Time recovery, Disaster plans
10- Logging at Scale: ELK stack basics, structured JSON logging, correlation IDs
11- Health Checks: Probes for k8s/load balancers, endpoint monitoring
12- Tech Leadership: Mentoring, architectural decision records (ADR), tradeoffs
13- Documentation Culture: Keeping docs close to code, living docs, diagrams
14- Compliance: Audit logs, activity tracking models, legal constraints
15- Legacy Code: Strangler fig pattern, refactoring strategies, incremental upgrades
